attributes.action: Council tax vacation for 3 months due to COVID-19 Pandemic
attributes.additional_details: There is significant financial implication Of COVID-19 pandemic on famolies. So there should be rebate on council tax.
attributes.background: Provide council tax relief for 3 months due to COVID-19 Pandemic

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303274

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
